name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $url
desc: Returns: An absolute URI that is used to identify this charge item definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance; also called its canonical identifier. This SHOULD be globally unique and SHOULD be a literal address at which at which an authoritative instance of this charge item definition is (or will be) published. This URL can be the target of a canonical reference. It SHALL remain the same when the charge item definition is stored on different servers.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An absolute URI that is used to identify this charge item definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance; also called its canonical identifier. This SHOULD be globally unique and SHOULD be a literal address at which at w

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: A formal identifier that is used to identify this charge item definition when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

name: $addidentifier
desc: A formal identifier that is used to identify this charge item definition when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A formal identifier that is used to identify this charge item definition when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

name: $::version
desc: Returns: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the charge item definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the charge item definition author and is not expected to be globally unique. For example, it might be a timestamp (e.g. yyyymmdd) if a managed version is not available. There is also no expectation that versions can be placed in a lexicographical sequence. To provide a version consistent with the Decision Support Service specification, use the format Major.Minor.Revision (e.g. 1.0.0). For more information on versioning knowledge assets, refer to the Decision Support Service specification. Note that a version is required for non-experimental active assets.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the charge item definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the charge item definition author and is not expected to be globa

name: $title
desc: Returns: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the charge item definition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the charge item definition.

name: $derivedFromUri
desc: Returns: The URL pointing to an externally-defined charge item definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this definition.

name: $addderivedFromUri
desc: The URL pointing to an externally-defined charge item definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this definition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The URL pointing to an externally-defined charge item definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this definition.

name: $partOf
desc: Returns: A larger definition of which this particular definition is a component or step.

name: $addpartOf
desc: A larger definition of which this particular definition is a component or step.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A larger definition of which this particular definition is a component or step.

name: $replaces
desc: Returns: As new versions of a protocol or guideline are defined, allows identification of what versions are replaced by a new instance.

name: $addreplaces
desc: As new versions of a protocol or guideline are defined, allows identification of what versions are replaced by a new instance.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: As new versions of a protocol or guideline are defined, allows identification of what versions are replaced by a new instance.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The current state of the ChargeItemDefinition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The current state of the ChargeItemDefinition.

name: $experimental
desc: Returns: A Boolean value to indicate that this charge item definition is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing) and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A Boolean value to indicate that this charge item definition is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing) and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

name: $date
desc: Returns: The date  (and optionally time) when the charge item definition was published. The date must change when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the charge item definition changes.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date  (and optionally time) when the charge item definition was published. The date must change when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the charge i

name: $publisher
desc: Returns: The name of the organization or individual that published the charge item definition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The name of the organization or individual that published the charge item definition.

name: $contact
desc: Returns: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

name: $addcontact
desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

name: $description
desc: Returns: A free text natural language description of the charge item definition from a consumer's perspective.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A free text natural language description of the charge item definition from a consumer's perspective.

name: $useContext
desc: Returns: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These contexts may be general categories (gender, age, ...) or may be references to specific programs (insurance plans, studies, ...) and may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate charge item definition instances.

name: $adduseContext
desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These contexts may be general categories (gender, age, ...) or may be references to specific programs (insurance plans, studies, ...) and may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate charge item definition instances.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These contexts may be general categories (gender, age, ...) or may be references to specific programs (insurance plans, studies, ...) and may be used to assist w

name: $jurisdiction
desc: Returns: A legal or geographic region in which the charge item definition is intended to be used.

name: $addjurisdiction
desc: A legal or geographic region in which the charge item definition is intended to be used.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A legal or geographic region in which the charge item definition is intended to be used.

name: $copyright
desc: Returns: A copyright statement relating to the charge item definition and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the charge item definition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A copyright statement relating to the charge item definition and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the charge item definition.

name: $approvalDate
desc: Returns: The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage.

name: $lastReviewDate
desc: Returns: The date on which the resource content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after approval but does not change the original approval date.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date on which the resource content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after approval but does not change the original approval date.

name: $effectivePeriod
desc: Returns: The period during which the charge item definition content was or is planned to be in active use.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The period during which the charge item definition content was or is planned to be in active use.

name: $code
desc: Returns: The defined billing details in this resource pertain to the given billing code.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The defined billing details in this resource pertain to the given billing code.

name: $instance
desc: Returns: The defined billing details in this resource pertain to the given product instance(s).

name: $addinstance
desc: The defined billing details in this resource pertain to the given product instance(s).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The defined billing details in this resource pertain to the given product instance(s).

name: $applicability
desc: Returns: Expressions that describe applicability criteria for the billing code.

name: $addapplicability
desc: Expressions that describe applicability criteria for the billing code.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Expressions that describe applicability criteria for the billing code.

name: $propertyGroup
desc: Returns: Group of properties which are applicable under the same conditions. If no applicability rules are established for the group, then all properties always apply.

name: $addpropertyGroup
desc: Group of properties which are applicable under the same conditions. If no applicability rules are established for the group, then all properties always apply.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Group of properties which are applicable under the same conditions. If no applicability rules are established for the group, then all properties always apply.
